pages.text: Attributes form the basis of your character. There are   five base attributes: $(br2)$(6)Constitution $() increases your base health and health regeneration.$(br2)$(c)Strength  $()increases weapon damage for strength based weapons like axes.

$(2)Dexterity $() increases weapon damage for dexterity based weapons like bows. $(br2)$(9)Intelligence $() increases your energy pool. $(br2)$(d)Wisdom$() increases your energy regeneration. $(br2)These base attributes can be upgraded with experience by using the /attributes command.
